channel.title: admin on Alok Tripathy
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Alok Tripathy

item.description: Hi, I’m Alok! I’m an incoming CS Ph.D. student at UC Berkeley. Broadly, I am interested in designing algorithms and programming models that leverage high-performance systems, particularly heterogeneous systems. My work is supported by the NSF Fellowship. Before coming to Berkeley, I worked with Oded Green in David Bader’s HPC lab at Georgia Tech (Go Jackets!).
